pageContext.claim: “State Supreme Court in Pennsylvania just affirmed that Ballot harvesting remains illegal. We will be watching that the Democrats do not Ballot Harvest - a felony. In other words, the Republican Party won on the atrocious Ballot Harvesting Scam.”
pageContext.analysis: Third-party ballot collectors (or "ballot harvesting," in Trump's phrasing) are legal in many states. Political operatives from both sides routinely do it to ensure that voters who requested absentee ballots actually turn them in. Supporters say third-party collectors help enfranchise homebound and elderly voters who could not otherwise get to the polls or who would have some difficulty returning mail ballots.
